name: Task Donegeon 2.0 - 0.5.45 - Math Muncher Expansion
description: This update massively expands the 'Math Muncher' minigame. It now includes a full curriculum for grades 1-6, with 10 unique challenges per grade. The game features a dynamic grid that adapts to problem complexity (12x12 or 6x6) and an endless progression system where the game speeds up after a player masters all 10 challenges in a grade.
